parameter.name: attachLimit
parameter.description: Only attach files if under this limit (in KBytes).

parameter.name: mailformat
parameter.description: Whether the Notification Email should be Rich HTML or Plain Text (html, plaintext).

parameter.name: fromType
parameter.description: The type of from address (noreply, custom, field).

parameter.name: fromValue
parameter.description: Custom email address or field id.

parameter.name: recipients
parameter.description: Email address to send notification to (split with return character '\n').

parameter.name: type
parameter.description: What is included in the message (data, link, or fields).

parameter.name: hideEmpty
parameter.description: Flag to not include empty fields in the email.

parameter.name: showSection
parameter.description: Flag to show section headings in email.

parameter.name: formId
parameter.description: ID of the form to which the notification email belongs.
